info.author: Brian Tomlinson
info.description:
Readme:
====================================

Pounce is a simple downloader written in Python.  It was designed specifically to be run from the Linux command line
and provides DBUS notifications using notify2 when downloads are completed.

Example usage:
------------------------------

Simple single file downloading:

$ pounce -u http://www.pathtoresource.com/resource.file -o /path/to/save/in/

Download links contained in a text file:

$ pounce -f /file/containing/links.txt -o /save/files/here/

Extras:
------------------------------

A test folder is provided with a text file and csv file which you can use to ensure that file input
functionality works on your system.

Developer contact info:
-----------------------

Brian Tomlinson
darthlukan@gmail.com
www.brianctomlinson.com
info.name: Pounce
info.summary: A simple CLI file downloader written for Python-3.x
info.html_description:
Pounce is a simple downloader written in Python. It was designed specifically to be run from the Linux command line and provides DBUS notifications using notify2 when downloads are completed.

Example usage:

Simple single file downloading:

$ pounce -u http://www.pathtoresource.com/resource.file -o /path/to/save/in/

Download links contained in a text file:

$ pounce -f /file/containing/links.txt -o /save/files/here/

Extras:

A test folder is provided with a text file and csv file which you can use to ensure that file input functionality works on your system.

Developer contact info:

Brian Tomlinson darthlukan@gmail.com www.brianctomlinson.com
